content:
✅ Approved the contribution.
Comment: good for beginners

❌ Rejected the contribution.
Comment: Already plenty of CoC like this one

* Please format all variables, e.g. [[n]].

Input section
* Please change the whole thing to:
A string [[n]] of digits with each digit between 0 and F

Output section
* Please change it to:
An integer for the sum of digits

Constraints section
* Please change it to:
Letters in [[n]] will be upper case only
* Please add:
1 ≤ length of [[n]] ≤ 10

Stub generator
* Please add "write answer".

Thank you.

Please format variables and mention that variable n is the string of digits in the input section, also add the line numbers in both output and input sections, so e.g. <<Line 1:>> A string of digits [[n]]

✅ Approved the contribution.
Comment: It is a unique and fun problem which is both challenging for newer players and fun for more experienced programmers to make as short as possible.
Thank you for the help this was my first question very useful criticism.
